original_text: Through the wrath of the Lord of hosts is the land darkened, and the people shall be as the fuel of the fire: no man shall spare his brother.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와의 진노로 말미암아 이 땅이 불타리니 백성은 불에 섶과 같을 것이라 사람이 자기의 형제를 아끼지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: Through the wrath of the Lord of hosts
and the people shall be as the fuel of the fire
No man shall spare his brother
